DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_Install the trap over <ItemConsume Type="Duration">[0] seconds</> When triggered, it deals <Exec.PhysicalDamageTrue>[0] #</> initially, <Exec.PhysicalDamageTrue>[1] #</> per second, and <Exec.PhysicalDamageTrue>[2] #</> with each movement. For players, the effect lasts for <Duration>[3] seconds</>, reducing <MoveSpeedMod>[3]% #</>. For monsters, the effect also lasts for <Duration>[4] seconds</>. Targets cannot move beyond a certain radius of the trap.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: Set a trap over <ItemConsume Type="Duration">[0] seconds</>. When triggered, immediately deal <Exec.PhysicalDamageTrue>[0] _</> and <Exec.PhysicalDamageTrue>[1] _</> per second. Additionally inflict <Exec.PhysicalDamageTrue>[2] _</> with each movement. Effect lasts <Duration>[3] seconds</> on players and <Duration>[4] seconds</> on monsters, reducing <MoveSpeedMod>_ by [3]%</>. The target cannot move beyond a certain radius of the trap.
